title: How do u recover your pbe account
body: I strongly agree that riot should make pbe accounts able to be recovered. I have lost my account for about a year now and I don't know how to find it back plz riot help me.

replies.body:
Hey Cheetaking123,

The best way to go about recovering your PBE account would be to submit a ticket to Riot Support. There you can ask them questions and give them the information needed to possibly get your account back. 

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Good luck! 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
